Topic.Title: Does anybody think then Yahoo will be bought out?

Message.Msg: The only one that would even consider buying out Yahoo, would be FB and they should have done that months ago.

Message.Title: If not for Yang and BOD YHOO would have been bought out not only when MSFT was offering....
Message.Msg: ...$47 bil in 2008 but around this time last year after Bartz got fired. It still is the best solution for shareholders and would make sense and be easy for MSFT or AAPL. It would have made sense for Ma as well but he never really had the money. There are a few others it would work for as well, and $30 bil or so would do it now.

Message.Title: SPAM from everywhere. Why is Yahoo letting it through ?
Message.Msg: Yahoo must have spilled all our email address's. How to get yahoo attention and fix the leak ?

Message.Title: Yahoo MAJOR FAIL!!!! Yahoo alienates all of Canada!!
Message.Msg: Yahoo hates Canadians. We can't see messages from Yahoo.ca and we can't even post comments on any stock listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange (.to) and we could until just a couple of weeks ago. Yahoo, you are starting to do everything WRONG!!!

Topic.Title: Does anybody think then Yahoo will be bought out?

Message.Msg: I have to agree with you. I don't think she will let YHOO to go. She wants her $100M contract as CEO of YHOO. But again, if the premium is huge and retain her as CEO, I think she will be pressured to go along. Plus, YHOO BOD has the final say. I don't think any news of buyout or merger will not come through until they see YHOO is truly flourishing (at least two quarters).
